lead_paragraph: The man, Nyi Kyab, 45, was protesting Chinese rule, said Free Tibet, an organization working for Tibet’s self-determination.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Tibetan Sets Himself on Fire
headline.main: Tibetan Dies After Setting Himself on Fire in Protest

snippet: The man, Nyi Kyab, 45, was protesting Chinese rule, said Free Tibet, an organization working for Tibet’s self-determination.
abstract: Former Buddhist monk Nyi Kyab sets himself on fire near makeshift shrine with photo of Dalai Lama; he is second Tibetan in two weeks to stage such protest.
